room.roomDisplay: This room smells clean and damp, like it’s just been cleaned. Everything is in its place and very tidy. There is a large, comfortable chair in the corner…maybe take a rest? You wander through the room and see a fancy invitation opened on the table. Near the invitation are two large boxes with beautiful ball gowns inside. Tucked under the chair, you notice what appears to be a glass slipper?

You feel a perfect breeze and find yourself in a bright, airy room with open double doors. It’s an intriguing room with many curiosities and trinkets. You hear a rustling and turn to see a bag of live insects near a chair. On the bookshelf is a sparkling crystal sphere. You hear birds chirping outside, leaves softly rustling and …was that a splash?

The delicious smell of fresh, warm gingerbread lures you into the room. There is a hot oven and you can feel the heat, but that gingerbread must be somewhere here. You see a small structure in the corner of the room. Is it a cage? As you back away, you trip over a heavy, ornate chest on the floor of the room. Could it be treasure?

You hear beautiful singing in the distance. Enchanted, you follow the sound. You find yourself in a strange room with only a window. In the corner, there is a glint from a golden hairbrush. You see just a portion of a long, golden braid.

You see the bed in this room, piled high with pillows and blankets. Tea, lozenges and tissue are piled high on the nightstand. On the floor is a small red mound of fabric….a hooded cape. On the table near the door, a sleeping cap in a flowery pattern. On the ground near the table, you see a handled basket, filled with food and packages.

You can smell the fresh straw from outside the room. It is a large room with immense locked doors. A spindle sits in the center of the room, well worn and situated near a sturdy stool. There is a HUGE pile of hay completely surrounding the spindle. Under a tarp in the corner, there seems to be stack of gold bars. A heavy book lays on the floor near the spindle and stool….in gold letters “Best Baby Names”…

This room is crowded with items and smells of leather. There are rows and rows of shoes lined up on the shelves along the wall. There are tools on several work tables placed around the room. You hear some whispering from the closet. There is a pile of folded clothing on a table near a workbench. The clothing is very small sizes, for a child or…?

This room is cozy and dim. There is an odd silence made eerier by the low light in the room. There is a large bed that looks so comfortable, and you feel so tired. Those fluffy pillows look so inviting to your sleepy eyes. You are distracted by a lump in the corner – under a pile of clothing is an old spindle, it’s needle sharp and shining. As you sit, you find a small, wooden box…a first aid kit?

As your eyes adjust to the darkness, you find yourself in tall room with stone walls. As your stomach growls, you see a shining red apple on the table, tempting your hunger. An ornate, gold mirror hangs on the wall. When you pass the mirror, you notice no reflection of your image. Isn’t that odd? There are several very small tools strewn across the room.

This room is furnished sparsely, with contents that look worn or handed down. There is an ax propped against the wall near the door. It smells of freshly chopped wood and a fowl? As your eyes adjust to the light of the room, you spot a large nest in the corner near the fireplace. There is not much to see in this sparse room, except is that a golden feather….?
